name: Time & Time
summary: Tabasco Bob and Steve Brian bring it all together in ‘The Passion’. Soulful vocals, skillful edits, and a wicked synth solo create a roller-coaster ride of a tune, and it’s obvious these guys had some fun in the studio making this one!
info:
• 发售日期: 2014.7.28
  • 录音: Armada Music
  • 碟片数量: 1
